description: Palmolive Clarifying Micellar Hair Shampoo is pH balanced for daily use and infused with Natural Rose Oil. Contains 0% silicones.Made with gentle yet effective cleansing micellar water, Palmolive Micellar Shampoo & Conditioner acts like a magnet to capture and lift away impurities without stripping hair. Infused with natural Rose Oil, this aromatic and lightweight formula provides a deep cleanse to hair, removing build up by strand. pH balanced for daily use and contains 0% silicones.Hair is left feeling cleansed and refreshed.Palmolive Clarifying Micellar Hair Shampoo is lightweight and contains 0% siliconesMicellar ingredient lifts away impurities without stripping hair's natural moisture.Gently moisturises hair and doesn't leave build-up.Hair is left feeling beautifully hydrated, soft and healthy.pH balanced and infused with Natural Rose Oil.
name: Palmolive Clarifying Micellar Hair Shampoo Rose Oil 370mL
